$documentation.purpose: Registry of product requirements (Epics) and their associated User Stories. Requirements translate JTBDs into implementable features with clear acceptance criteria.
$documentation.phase_position: Created at Prototype CP2 - derived from jtbd_registry.json, consumed by screen/module registries and downstream stages

key_attributes.items[].id: REQ-NNN for epics, US-NNN for user stories
key_attributes.items[].title: Concise feature/capability name
key_attributes.items[].pain_point_refs: Array of PP-X.X IDs this addresses
key_attributes.items[].jtbd_refs: Array of JTBD-X.X IDs this fulfills
key_attributes.items[].screen_refs: Array of screen IDs implementing this

validation_rules: Every REQ MUST link to at least one JTBD or pain point
P0 requirements MUST have screens defined in screen_registry.json

description: Registry of Requirements (Epics & User Stories) with traceability
